Text:
This was a great book, and I bought it! Thanks for ULing this!

BTW: will you also be ULing Aircel's Samurai and Malibu's Dark Wolf? I hope so!!!!

again, thank you

Mothra67,

Alas, I do not have either of those series. I only had this one because the bulk of it was already on TPB and I happened across the remaining 7 while trying to run down other obscure stuff. Glad you like this one though, and you're very welcome! Thanks for all the great stuff YOU upload!
